name: Caternaut
description:
Get ready for a Planetary Platforming experience!

Help the little Caternaut reach his way back to planet Earth by platforming between planets!

Created solely for Epic Mega Jam 2019, team 4-AG comes together to create their first ever collaborative project!

This game was created within a 7-day time frame. All assets were created within the allotted time of the competition. We hope you enjoy our first ever project!

UPDATE!

We fixed the ending animation issue where it doesn't play on level load.
